allow: Bash(docker exec scalex-postgres psql -U postgres -d scalex -c "SELECT c.id, c.unit_id, c.front_text, c.back_text, u.title as unit_title FROM cards c LEFT JOIN units u ON c.unit_id = u.id WHERE c.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY u.order_index, c.order_index LIMIT 20;")
Bash(docker exec scalex-postgres psql -U postgres -d scalex -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_cards FROM cards WHERE deleted_at IS NULL;")
Bash(docker exec scalex-postgres psql -U postgres -d scalex -c "SELECT unnest(enum_range(NULL::user_role_enum)) AS role;")
Bash(docker exec scalex-postgres psql -U postgres -d scalex -c "SELECT id, email, firebase_uid, role FROM users WHERE email = ''vyeiralucas@gmail.com'';")

Bash(docker exec scalex-postgres psql -U postgres -d scalex -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''public'' AND table_name LIKE ''%session%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%video%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%queue%'';")
